metadata.title: USN-4535-1 --  RDFLib vulnerability
metadata.description: Gabriel Corona discovered that RDFLib did not properly load modules on the command-line. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause RDFLib to execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2019-7653)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4535-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-rdflib - 4.1.2-3+deb8u1build0.16.04.1 python-rdflib-doc - 4.1.2-3+deb8u1build0.16.04.1 python-rdflib-tools - 4.1.2-3+deb8u1build0.16.04.1 python-rdflib - 4.1.2-3+deb8u1build0.16.04.1 No subscription required
